about_main_text:
DRIMESYNC - ULTIMATE SECURITY GUIDE
"We believe in mathematics, but error is human. Trust NO ONE."
==========================================

1. WHY THIS APP?
-------------------------------
Imagine a titanium safe that only you can open, even if you store it in a public warehouse.
DrimeSync Unofficial turns your Cloud (Drime) into this secure warehouse.

2. üè¶ SECURITY HIGHER THAN BANKING STANDARD 
------------------------------------
DrimeSync Unofficial uses the **XChaCha20-Poly1305 (IETF)** standard.
This is the "Next-Gen" algorithm favored by Google and Cloudflare for its speed and flawless security on mobile.

- **Encryption**: XChaCha20 with Poly1305 for integrity.
- **Key Derivation**: **Argon2id**. Unlike old standards (PBKDF2), Argon2id resists GPU/ASIC attacks thanks to its memory hardness.

Currently, it would take a monstrous amount of energy and unimaginable computing time to crack your key by brute force.
This is counted in thousands of years and billions of euros with a supercomputer.

3. üïµÔ∏è YOUR DATA IS YOURS (AND THAT'S IT) 
----------------------------------------------
Unlike classic "Clouds" (Google Drive, Dropbox...) which can technically scan your files (for ads or upon request), here we use **End-to-End Encryption (E2EE)**.

- Your files are encrypted on your device BEFORE leaving for the Internet.
- The Cloud receives only a "mush" of unreadable data (digital noise).
- Even if Drime gets hacked or a curious employee looks, your data remains unreadable.

4. üöÄ SHARING VIA "CAPSULE": ULTRA-MEGA SECURE 
------------------------------------------------
To share a file, we do not generate a simple link (which can be intercepted or guessed).
We create a **Zero-Knowledge Capsule**:
1. The file is transformed into a standalone HTML page.
2. It is encrypted with your Password + a Unique 16-character Token (the Salt).
3. This capsule is sent to the Cloud and you get a public link.

WHY IS THIS INCREDIBLE?
Imagine sending an armored suitcase by Post. Even if the postman steals it, he cannot open it.
To open it, the recipient needs 3 distinct things:
1. The Suitcase (The Link to the Capsule).
2. The Secret Code (Your Password).
3. The Physical Key (The Token).

5. üìö FEATURES
------------------
- UPLOAD/DOWNLOAD: Mirror a workspace to your device, or your device to a Drime workspace. 
                    Manual download or upload of files.
- SHARE: Standard (Link) or Capsule (Encrypted).
- WATERMARK: Mark your documents (Identity, Salary...) to prevent their fraudulent reuse by third parties (identity theft).

6. üö® WARNINGS
-----------------
This is an UNOFFICIAL application.
The author declines all responsibility in case of password loss.
WITHOUT YOUR PASSWORD, YOUR FILES ARE LOST FOREVER. There is no "Forgot password" button here. This is the price of true security.

7. üêõ KNOWN BUGS
-----------------
- Folder/File "0": If an item is named "0" (without extension), it is uploaded as "0.renamed" (API issue). It is automatically renamed to "0" upon download.
- Personal Workspace (ID: 0): This default workspace generates many 403 errors (Rate Limit) during download. Prefer other workspaces. For ID:0, use the official web interface.

about_filigranage_text:
üõ°Ô∏è SECURE WATERMARK GUIDE (Anti-Fraud)

============================

üí° THE TIP

Never send your documents naked! Use this watermark indicating as recipient: "RENTAL FILE - AGENCY [NAME]".
If your ID is used to open a consumer credit 6 months later, the watermark will prove that the leak comes from this agency.


1. WHAT IS IT?
------------------------
This tool applies an "Indelible Digital Seal" on your documents (PDF & Images).
Unlike a simple "Confidential" watermark, this one is intelligent. It proves 3 things:
    1. WHO sent it (Proof of origin).
    2. FOR WHOM it is intended (Prevents reuse).
    3. The INTEGRITY of the document (Links the visual to the digital data).

Usage examples: Rental files, Loan applications, Sending identity documents.


2. THE PROTECTION ARSENAL (4 Layers)
--------------------------------------
When you secure a document, we merge 4 technologies:
    [A] "ANTI-AI" MESH (Visual): The watermark text is not simply placed. It is geometrically distorted (random noise).
        Why? This prevents Artificial Intelligences (AI) from cleanly "erasing" the watermark. 
        If one tries to erase it, the document becomes blurry and "dirty".

    [B] THE MICRO-BORDER (The Zoom Test): The gray lines at the top and bottom are not strokes. 
        If you zoom in, you will see that they are made of microscopic text containing the unique ID of the document.
        Effect: Disappears almost systematically if the document is printed and then scanned, or compressed. It is a proof of original quality.

    [C] YELLOW DOTS (Traceability): A pattern of almost invisible yellow dots is printed on the entire surface.
        Effect: Like on banknotes, this acts as a "license plate". Even if the document is cropped or cut, this signature persists.

    [D] THE QR CODE (The Digital Anchor): This QR code contains the cryptographic fingerprint (Hash) of the file.
        It mathematically links the visual to its content.


3. HOW TO VERIFY A DOCUMENT?
---------------------------------
Do you have a doubt about a document? Do these 3 quick tests:
    TEST 1: THE ZOOM (Quick) Open the PDF and zoom in strongly on the gray line at the bottom.
        ‚úÖ TRUE: You read a sequence of sharp numbers and letters.
        ‚ùå FALSE: You see a very blurry line or a solid gray stroke (Proof of scan/falsification).

    TEST 2: THE CONTEXT (Most important) Scan the QR Code. 
        It must display: "Document for [RECIPIENT] - [DATE]".
        Example of fraud: You are a Bank, but the QR code says "For Real Estate Agency". The document was stolen from another file!

    TEST 3: THE MATHEMATICAL PROOF (In case of dispute)
        This test serves if someone has modified the content of the document (ex: changed the salary amount) by bypassing the visual watermark.
        The QR Code contains the DNA (Hash) of the ORIGINAL file (before marking).
        If a forger modifies the numbers on the watermarked document, he cannot modify the Hash hidden in the QR Code (because he does not have your source file).

        In case of doubt, ask the sender to provide the HASH of the raw original file.
        Compare it with the HASH in the QR Code of the received document.
        > If it matches: The QR code is authentic.
        > If the text of the document differs from the original while the Hash matches: The document was falsified AFTER adding the watermark.
about_share_text:
SECURE SHARING GUIDE

DrimeSync Unofficial offers two sharing methods. Choose the one adapted to the sensitivity of your document.

---

1. ‚òÅÔ∏è STANDARD SHARING (Cloud Link)
-----------------------------------
Ideal for quick sharing of non-confidential files.
- **Functioning**: The file is sent to your Cloud. A public link is generated instantly.
- **New**: Supports VERY LARGE files (Automatic Multipart Mode beyond 30 MB).
- **Options**:
  * üîí **Password**: Protect access to the link (the server verifies the password).
  * ‚è≥ **Expiration**: The link will self-destruct tonight at midnight.
  * üîî **Notification**: Receive an email when someone downloads the file.
  * üì• **Allow Download**: If unchecked, the file is in "View only" (if supported).

---

2. üíä SECURE CAPSULE (Zero-Knowledge) - So-called "Post-Quantum" Security
----------------------------------------
The "Secret Agent" mode for your sensitive data (Banking, Medical, Intimate).
Even if Drime is hacked or if the Internet connection is broken by a future quantum computer, hackers only recover a locked suitcase. 

- **Principle**: We do not believe in the Cloud. We believe in mathematics.
- **Automatic Process**:
  1. The app creates a "Digital Suitcase" (HTML Page) on your PC.
  2. It locks your encrypted file (AES-256) with YOUR password AND the Token.
  3. It is this *locked* suitcase that is sent to the Cloud.

üõ°Ô∏è WHY IS IT SOLID? (In 3 points)
1. Independence from the Cloud: The file is encrypted at your place (AES-256). Even if the server is hacked, the content remains unreadable according to predictable technological evolution of the next 50 years.
2. Anti-Brute-Force: We force the computer to perform 2,000,000 calculations to verify a single password.
    * Consequence: The energy and time cost to force access becomes prohibitive, even for a supercomputer.
    * Result: With a strong password, the theoretical cracking time exceeds thousands of years.
3. Zero-Knowledge: The "Salt" (Token) is not stored in the file. Without it, the attack cannot mathematically even begin (excluding discovery of a future critical flaw in AES/PBKDF2 standards).

üì° How to open?
The recipient clicks on the link, downloads the suitcase (HTML), opens it in their browser, and must enter:
* The Password.
* The Token (Unique security code).

---

üöÄ SECURITY ADVICE (Out-of-Band)
Do not put all eggs in the same basket!
- Send the **LINK** by Email.
- Send the **PASSWORD** by SMS, 
- Send the **TOKEN** by Signal or WhatsApp.

If a hacker reads your emails, he has the link but not the codes. It is unstoppable.
